directions: Mix soup and cream together in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Stir in mushrooms and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes; add chicken, water chestnuts, bamboo shoots, corn, teriyaki sauce, and butter. Simmer all together for 10 minutes. Finally, stir in cooked broccoli and simmer for 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 pound cooked, cubed chicken breast meat
2 (8 ounce) cans water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 (10 ounce) package frozen broccoli, drained and cooked
title: Creamy Asian-Inspired Chicken and Broccoli
